classification_data.text: Julio César Suaza Contador Público EL SUSCRITO CONTADOR PÚBLICO JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA, IDENTIFICADO CON LA CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA No. 14.963.157 DE SANTIAGO DE CALI Y TARJETA PROFESIONAL No. 9881-T CERTIFICA QUE: 1°.) A la fecha, la composición Accionaria de la sociedad MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S., con NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, es de 2.000 acciones con un valor nominal de $ 50.000 cada acción, para un: CAPITAL AUTRIZADO $ 800.000.000 CAPITAL SUSCRITO $ 704.200.000 CAPITAL PAGADO $ 430.000.000 ACCIONISTA VR. ACCIÓN PARTICIPACIÓN NÚMERO DE ACCIONARIA ACCIONES DORA MATILDE TREJOS 50.000 50% 7.042 PUERTA, C.C. 31.953.854 JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR 50.000 50% 7.042 WELSCH, C.C. 16.733.280 TOTAL 14.084 2°.) Este certificado se expide por solicitud expresa del señor JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, representante Legal de MEGASERVICIOS INGENIERÍA S.A.S., NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, para trámites legales, comerciales y/o bancarios. Para constancia de los anterior, se firma en la ciudad de Cali, a los veintitrés (23) días del mes de septiembre de dos mil veinte (2020). JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA Revisor Fiscal T. P. No. 9881 – T E-Mail: julicesuа@gmail.com Móvil: 315 4962850 Cel 315 496 2860 E-mail julicesuа@hotmail.com Cali Colombia

This is not LINK_ONLY - no hyperlinks or URLs directing to external sources. 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** The main purpose of this document is to certify the shareholding composition of a company (MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S.). It shows: The document confirms equal ownership between two shareholders, each holding 7,042 shares representing 50% of the company's capital. The total share capital is precisely documented, with clear identification of both shareholders through their full names and identification numbers. 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** This document is issued by a private individual (Julio César Suaza, a public accountant/tax auditor), not by a government authority like DIAN or Chamber of Commerce. It's issued by a corporate entity (through its tax auditor). 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** This is clearly an ACC document because it provides a comprehensive breakdown of the company's shareholding structure, verifying ownership details and capital distribution with official certification. The document definitively distinguishes itself from other administrative documents by its specific focus on shareholding composition, using precise accounting terminology and professional validation.
